title: Just another movie...
review: First time doing this so here we go... i love horror movies and of course wanted to watch it since the original was mostly the reason why i hate clowns and even don't like remakes cause mostly they suck, wanted to give it a chance cause mostly they suck, and well.. i wasn't all wrong, again... don't get me wrong the kids were amazing in their acting but the original is way better than this one. My humble opinion anyway

title: Had a good feeling... But
review: Man It started so good!!! but the end left me with nothing.
